title: Soil conservation for the Snowy Mountains Scheme
creator_credit: Snowy Mountains Authority and H Malcolm
brief_description: Shows what has been done, by planting grasses, shrubs and trees, to combat soil erosion and cover scarred surfaces which have been left by road-making in the Snowy Mountains Scheme.
